name: Intel Corporation
goal: Intel is a world leader in the design and manufacturing of essential products and technologies that power the cloud and an increasingly smart, connected world. Intel delivers computer, networking, and communications platforms spanning multiple industries. We are expanding the boundaries of technology through our relentless pursuit of 'Moore’s Law' and computing breakthroughs that make amazing experiences possible.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
